scripts.build: tsc --sourceMap false --outDir .dist && copy index.js .dist && copy index.d.ts .dist && copy config.js .dist && copy package.json .dist && copy LICENSE .dist && copy README.md .dist && rd /s /q .dist\tests
scripts.start: tsc --outDir .dist && copy index.js .dist && copy config.js .dist && node .dist/index.js
scripts.test: tsc --outDir .dist && copy index.js .dist && copy config.js .dist && cd .dist/tests && node index.js
